name: table

params.name: data_frame
params.description: The pandas data frame to be rendered to a table

params.name: scale
params.description: The display scale with units of fractional screen height. A value of 0.5 constrains the output to a maximum height equal to half the height of browser window when viewed. Values below 1.0 are usually recommended so the entire output can be viewed without scrolling.

doc: Adds the specified data frame to the display in a nicely formatted scrolling table
